item.title: 📝 sinberCS/switch2ai (146 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: sinberCS

📝 Repository: sinberCS/switch2ai

📄 Descrizione: switch2ai - A JetBrains IDE plugin enabling seamless collaboration between JetBrains IDEs and various AI agents (Cursor, Qoder, Claude code etc.). Key features include instant switching between different AI editors, rapid AI prompt input with AI selection, and fully custom commands with variable support for enhanced AI collaboration workflow.
